body.name: VIZIO V-Series 55"" Class (54.5"" Diag.) 4K HDR Smart TV (V555-H11)
features: 4k ultra hd with over 8 million pixels, 4 times the resolution of 1080p - enjoy every scene with breathtaking detail.
Full array backlight leds are evenly distributed across the screen's backlight for superior light uniformity and picture performance.

Vizio iq active 4k hdr processor inside, the lightning-fast iq active processor delivers superior picture processing, and more intelligent 4k upscaling engine displaying your favorite hd entertainment in spectacular 4k quality.
Active pixel tuning intelligent pixel-level brightness adjustments for increased picture accuracy and contrast
Included components: Power Cable, Remote Control, Stand, battery
body.description: Discover the wonder of 4K entertainment with the all-new VIZIO V-Series 4K HDR Smart TV, combining 4K Ultra HD resolution and full array backlighting with Dolby Vision high dynamic range and the IQ Active processor to achieve jaw-dropping picture quality. Stream, control and share quicker than ever with VIZIO’s SmartCast platform, including both Apple AirPlay 2 and Chromecast built-in, and browse Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, YouTube, and Prime Video, or specially curated content with Free Streaming Channels.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Smartest Value in 4K Discover the wonder of 4K entertainment with the all-new VIZO V-Series 4K HDR Smart TV, combining four times the resolution of 1080p televisions with breathtaking high dynamic range.

Dolby Vision HDR With incredible brightness, contrast, and color, Dolby Vision brings the entertainment to life before your eyes. 4K Ultra HD ​ With over 8 million pixels, 4 times the resolution of 1080p - enjoy every scene with breathtaking detail.​ Full Array Backlight ​ LEDs are evenly distributed across the screen's backlight for superior light uniformity and picture performance.​
Your best game, every time you play. Experience next-level gaming performance with VIZIO’s V-Gaming Engine.

Award-Winning VIZIO SmartCast With lightning fast navigation, enjoy instant access to the best selection of apps from top-tier streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, and many more right on the TV.

Stream Everything You Love Access your favorite apps, cast from your phone, or watch hundreds of free channels. Stream from your device with Apple AirPlay 2 and Chromecast built-in Stream movies, TV shows, music, and more or mirror your screen for presentations and video chats directly on your VIZIO SmartCast TV. Use your voice to control your TV Use Alexa, Google Home, and Apple Homekit for voice control and smart home integration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love the tv good picture and sound. A lot of free streaming. Only thing wrong is when you speak in too the remote it doesn't work that well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not 120hz as described
reviews.reviewText: Jokes on me I threw the box away and two days later realized this is a 60hz not 120hz as described. I should have done my own research and held the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent clarity and great streaming features
reviews.reviewText: My last Vizio has lasted 14 years and is still running but my new one is so much better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can’t open the remote to install batteries!
reviews.reviewText: We’ve both tried to open the remote to put in batteries. Can’t do it. It’s slippery and no way to grip properly to slide it open!! Might send the whole thing back. Who failed to design this?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Disappointing TV - pick a different model!
reviews.reviewText: Update: I have been using a ROKU Streambar for sound (which died today) and now I’m having to use the sound from the TV. Sound quality also sucks on this TV. 🙄—————-I bought this TV somewhere else in January 2021, and I wish I had purchased a different model. My previous Vizio experiences have all been very good, which is one reason this TV has disappointed me so much. There is something wrong with the picture. I’ve tried adjusting settings, I’ve bought new HDMI cables, but nothing has helped. The picture is like this no matter what I’m using: ROKU, BluRay player or Comcast TV.I’ve attached two pictures that give you an idea of the problem. The picture with the orange spot on the lady’s forehead is a discoloration in the TV, not in the production itself. I get these weird squares I can see, almost like it’s pixelated, but larger. It causes things to be off color, or distorted. You can see the weird little boxes in the other picture.This TV is wall mounted, which I had to pay someone to do. I am also past the 90 day return, so I think I would have to deal with Vizio directly? To get it down, I would have to pay someone to do that, and then figure out how to get it to the store, if they would even take it back at this point. For a TV that cost me about $364, it’s just not worth the hassle. I’ll put up with it as long as I can then just replace it with a different one.I will have serious reservations about getting another Vizio if this is the quality they are putting out these days.Don’t buy this model. It’s slick looking, and a nice size, but the picture is no good on kind. Is it a random defective unit?No idea, but keep shopping, seriously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Remote and Steaming Slow
reviews.reviewText: The remote control is trash. It makes me want a full refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Awesome buy for the price! Came fast! Will buy again. Other TV types can't cast what's on your phoneAND has built in free movies! Awesome!
